ther in the next e-mails

 call.

d the

y interested in reactor networks, flow devices, flow

 P.S>: Error messages from Matlab
> 
> >> igniter_mdot =3D @(t) Gaussian(t,=
1,0.02,0.2);
> >> x=3D igniter_mdot(1.0)
> ??? Undefined function or method=
 'Gaussian' for input arguments of 
> type 'double'.
> 
> Error in =3D=3D> =
@(t) Gaussian(t,1,0.02,0.2)
> 
> 
> >> ign =3D Func ('gaussian, 1, 2')
> ??=
? Input argument "n" is undefined.
> 
> Error in =3D=3D> Func.Func at 66
> =
  x.f1 =3D n;
>


Try this:

igniter_mdot =3D Func('gaussian', 0, [1 0.02 0=
.2]);
x =3D igniter_mdot(1.0);

Dave Mikolaitis
